窐窐窐

窐字的基本解释

窐
wā
低洼：“子能以窐为突乎？”
低洼的地方：“有窐中积雨，色微黄臭。”

窐
guī
甑下的小孔：“璋珪杂于甑窐兮。”
古代门旁的圭形小洞：“玉帛之贽委于窐衡。”

窐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guī］
［《廣韻》古攜切，平齊，見。］
［《廣韻》户圭切，平齊，匣。］
孔；洞。
[②]［wā］
［《集韻》於佳切，平佳，影。］
(1)凹陷。亦指低下处。
(2)使变成凹形。
(3)见“窐2寥”。

窐字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【穴字部】　窐； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页865第08
【廣韻】古攜切【集韻】【韻會】涓畦切，?音圭。甑空也。【楚辭·哀時命】珪璋雜于甑窐。【註】甑窐，土孔。甑，瓦器。窐，甑帶也。　又【集韻】【韻會】?烏瓜切，音窊。【五音集韻】戸圭切【等韻】胡圭切，?音攜。義?同。或作???。　又【集韻】於交切，窅平聲。窐寥，深遠貌。【宋玉·高唐賦】窐寥窈冥，不見其底。【註】深遠貌。或作漥。同洼。　又【集韻】淵畦切，音烓。深也。

窐字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
窐字的起名意思

暂无。

窐
Basic explanation of words
窐
wā
Low-lying: "Can you take a qi as a sudden?"
Low-lying place: "There is rain in the hole, the color is slightly yellow and smelly."
窐
guī
The small hole under the Zeng: "Zhanggui is mixed with Zengxi."
The Gui-shaped hole beside the ancient gate: "The Yusizhizhi is entrusted to Qingheng."
窐
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guī］
["Guangyun" ancient carrying cut, flat, see. ]
["Guangyun" Hu Guiqie, flat, box. ]
Hole; hole.
[②]［wā］
["Ji Yun" Yu Jiaqie, Ping Jia, film. ]
(1) Depression. Also refers to the lower part.
(2) Make it concave.
(3) See "Qing 2 Liao".
窐
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [Acupoint Word Department] 　窐; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 865 08
[Guang Yun] Ancient Carrying Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Chuan Qi cut,? Yin Gui. Zeng empty also. [Songs of the Chu·Sorrowful Life] Guizhang is mixed with Zengtang. [Note] Zengzhen, earth hole. Retort, pottery.窐, zeng with also.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui]? Wugua cut, sound stubborn. 【Pentaphonic rhyme】戸 Keiqi [Waiting rhyme] Hu Guiqie, sound carrying. Righteous? Same. Or as???.　 [Ji Yun] in cross cutting, flat sound. Wei Liao, far-reaching outlook. 【Song Yu·Gao Tang Fu】It's very lonely and lonely, and it doesn't see the bottom. [Note] The far-reaching look. Or make it. Same depression.　 [Ji Yun] Yuan Qi cut, sound 烓. Deep also.
